welcome_message.en_US: Welcome to the team! Get set to race!

code_error_wrong.en_US: That code is wrong. Please try again.

code_error_invalid.en_US: That code is not valid anymore.

garage_helper.en_US:
Use the arrows to choose your car. 
Press the green button to race!

garage_colors_helper.en_US:
Time for a new paint job.
What colour will you choose?

garage_stickers_helper.en_US:
Let's make you look like a real racer.
Pick some stickers for your car!

garage_engines_helper.en_US:
Make your car faster here! 
Upgrade your engine and boost!

garage_kits_helper.en_US:
Choose the right kit for the race country. 
Upgrade it to go faster!

garage_pitstop_usa.en_US: Try the Desert kit for this race!

garage_pitstop_italy.en_US: Try the Street kit for this race!

garage_pitstop_germany.en_US: Try the Aero kit for this race!

garage_pitstop_japan.en_US: Try the Neon kit for this race!

garage_pitstop_brazil.en_US: Try the Jungle kit for this race!

pause_helper.en_US:
Pro mode too hard? 
Rookie mode makes driving and boosting easier!

help_garage1.en_US: Choose a car to race with.

help_garage2.en_US:
Decorate your car by changing the
colour and adding stickers.

help_garage3.en_US:
Upgrade your engine speed and
your boost speed.

help_garage4.en_US:
Get ready to race by adding kit parts
and tyres to your car.

help_garage5.en_US: When you are ready to race press the flag!

help_garage6.en_US: Click to change your driving settings.

help_game1.en_US: Use the left and right buttons to move between lanes.

help_game1b.en_US: Tap the left or right side of the screen to steer.

help_game2.en_US: Collect the lightning bolts to fill boost!

help_game3.en_US: Collect toolboxes to trade for coins!

help_game4.en_US:
Avoid hitting these. 
They will slow you down!

help_game5.en_US: You can see how you're doing here.

help_game6.en_US:
This button activates the boost. 
In Rookie mode, it's automatic!

help_game7.en_US: Here you can change you driving settings and pause the race.

help_trophies1.en_US: This is where your trophies and medals are stored.

help_achievements1.en_US:
Take a look at your achievements!
Each of these is worth coins.

options_helper.en_US:
Pro mode too hard? 
Rookie mode makes driving and boosting easier!

single_race_helper.en_US:
Where shall we race? 
Click the arrows to choose.

series_race_helper.en_US:
Pick a tournament to race in!
Why not start with Beginner?

results_helper.en_US: What a race! You came in [POSITION]!

description.en_US: Win all the races in one country
Win all races in all countries
Race at least once with all car types
Win a Cup in each car

tutorial_steer.en_US:
Use the left and right buttons to move
between lanes.

tutorial_steer_mobile.en_US: Tap the left or right side of the screen to steer.

tutorial_brake.en_US: Press the down key to break.

tutorial_powerups.en_US: Collect the lightning bolts to fill boost!

tutorial_pickups.en_US: Collect toolboxes to trade for coins!

tutorial_boost.en_US: Press 'ENTER' Key or click here to use your boost!

tutorial_boost_mobile.en_US:
Press this button to activate the boost in
Pro driving mode. In Rookie, it's automatic!

tutorial_obstacles.en_US:
Avoid hitting these. They will
slow you down and lower your boost.

tutorial_hud.en_US: You can see how you're doing here.

tutorial_end.en_US: Now you are ready to race!

cutscene_announcer_single_race_usa.en_US:
Welcome to the U.S.A.! It's [NAME1] against
[NAME2]. What a showdown!
